thread.title: Senate approves bill rewriting post-crisis bank rules

title: Senate approves bill rewriting post-crisis bank rules
text:
Senate approves bill rewriting post-crisis bank rules 8:33am EDT - 01:01 
The U.S. Senate on Wednesday voted to ease bank rules, bringing Congress a step closer to passing the first rewrite of the Dodd-Frank reform law enacted after the global financial crisis a decade ago. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The U.S. Senate on Wednesday voted to ease bank rules, bringing Congress a step closer to passing the first rewrite of the Dodd-Frank reform law enacted after the global financial crisis a decade ago.
